pages.title: Coolant Port
pages.text: The Coolant Port allow you to insert or extract fluids from an $(l:reactor/active)actively cooled$(/l) Reactor.$(br2)This Port accept and emit vanilla fluids but only if they are valid $(l:misc/coolantsystem)coolants or vapors$(/l).$(br2)A $(l:misc/wrench)wrench$(/l) can be used to change the Port from input to output mode.
$(l)Mandatory:$() no$(br)$(l)Valid positions:$() any face (not on frame)$(br)$(l)Graphical interface:$() no$(br)$(l)Wrench:$() a $(l:misc/wrench)wrench$(/l) can be used to toggle the Port mode
